phys::WorldGetSet Class Reference

virtual World * GetGameWorld () const =0
 This gets the World that this class is working with.
virtual void SetGameWorld (World *GameWorld_)=0
 This sets the phys::World that this Manager works with.

Detailed Description

A simple set of function to manage a pointer to the gameworld.

This creates a common interface for all objects that are expected to interact with the world.
